title: The software update failed
answer:
Please visit the Huawei Downloads Page and re-download the latest update package for your phone model. Please refer to the package's update guide in order to complete the update.

Please connect your phone to a charger before proceeding with the update. If the phone runs out of charge during the update, the update will fail.

Please don't remove or insert the battery during an update.

If you perform the update using a microSD card, do not remove the card during the update.

If the update is still unsuccessful, it is recommended that you back up any files and then restore factory settings.

If the problem persists, please contact Huawei customer service or take your phone and purchase invoice to a service center for inspection.
